## How the mod works
The mod adjusts the game logic to minimize instances where citizens become permanently homeless.
There are bugs in the game: - Only a specific group of citizens (always the same ones) can look for houses. If this group can't find housing, the others never get a chance, resulting them forever stuck on the streets. - Although parks have a set homeless capacity, they can actually hold an unlimited number of homeless citizens.
For first-time installations or if you suspect problems with homelessness later on, use the remove-homeless buttons in the settings to clear homeless citizens.
